ps_us_id = #{psUsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_pst_id = #{psPstId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ps_id = #{psId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update projects set ps_us_id = #{psUsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_pst_id = #{psPstId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_state_id = #{psStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_name = #{psName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_pictureaddress = #{psPictureaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_money = #{psMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ps_getmoney = #{psGetmoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ps_getpeople = #{psGetpeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_ishot = #{psIshot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_date = #{psDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ps_address = #{psAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_goal = #{psGoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_days = #{psDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_video = #{psVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_story = #{psStory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_support = #{psSupport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_repay = #{psRepay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_aboutme = #{psAboutme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_starttime = #{psStarttime,jdbcType=DATE}, ps_endtime = #{psEndtime,jdbcType=DATE} where ps_id = #{psId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM projects pro LEFT JOIN projectsstate pros ON pro.ps_state_id=pros.st_id WHERE pro.ps_ishot=1 LIMIT 0,8;
SELECT * FROM projects pro LEFT JOIN projectsstate pros ON pro.ps_state_id=pros.st_id ORDER BY ps_date DESC LIMIT 0,8;
